short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Watch any wallet on the PKT Cash blockchain

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Track balance, mining income and transactions for any wallet address on the PKT Cash blockchain. With multiple portfolios, you can keep a close watch on your mining addresses, your trading addresses or any other interesting addresses you may find.

Watchr is a free portfolio tracker extension specifically for the PKT Cash blockchain.

Here are some key features:

ğŸ‘€  Track any wallet address.
Add interesting wallets to to your portfolio - even ones that you don't own.

ğŸ’² Instant access to your balance.
No need to sync a wallet. Watchr is the fastest way to check your combined balance for multiple wallet addresses.

ğŸ“  Separate addresses in to multiple portfolios.
Categorise your wallets and view combined balance in PKT and USD.

âš¡ï¸  Quickly add wallet addresses with packetscan.io.
Integrates with the packetscan.io block explorer to make adding a new wallet a breeze.

ğŸ“ˆ  View information about any wallet address.
Balance, mining stats and transaction history for any wallet.

ğŸ“· Generate a QR code for any of your wallet address
Share wallet addresses with other apps with QR codes.

ğŸ“±Take Watchr with you.
The Watchr app is available for free on iOS and Android. Search "Watchr by pkt.watch" on your favourite app store.
